  • LESS

    • px to rem
      • px to em

      # LESS

      # px to rem

      // font-size: .rem(14)[] => font-size: 0.875rem
.rem(@px) {
  value: unit((@px/16), rem);
}

      px to rem

      # px to em

      // font-size: .em(14, 16)[] => font-size: 0.875em
.em(@px, @parent) {
  value: unit((@px/@parent), em);
}

      px to em
